title: FS: T206 Collection Uzit, Lenox, Carolina Brights, Blank Scrap +
author: usernamealreadytaken

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Collection Uzit, Lenox, Carolina Brights, Blank Scrap +
posts.post_content:
Thinking about selling a large chunk of my collection. About 50 cards total (29 PSA, 4 SGC, 22 raw); including
Lenox (x3), Uzit, Carolina Brights, Scrap w/ blank back, Hindu, Cycle 350 & 460, a WaJo portrait and a bunch of commons (all rare backs and Hof are graded). Only interested in selling in one shot at this point. Please let know if interested and I can put together a list and some pics. Thanks! Chris.
I would be interested in a list, scans and a price. Please send to [url]shorttmail66@yahoo.com[/url]

why are you selling??!!!you've been collecting these a long time....hope all is ok:)
To all those expressing concern - no worries. I'm just downsizing my collection, and, like everyone else, could use some scratch. Thanks!

Can you send a scan to;
[url]gorehawg@gmail.com[/url]

Campbell OM 3(mc)

Thanks.

Apologies to all seeking pics/prices on card(s). I am considering a couple offers on the lot. If/when it appears a deal on the lot cannot be had, I'll plan break out with individual pics/prices. Thanks! Chris.
